node.statement: QED (CONDITIONAL). If the key structural constraint (node 1.7) is established and the modified Cauchy-Schwarz or alternative approach (node 1.8) yields AB >= ||h||^4, then the clean reformulation (node 1.5) gives (Phi_n(p)-Phi_n(r))(Phi_n(q)-Phi_n(r)) >= Phi_n(r)^2, which is equivalent to the main conjecture 1/Phi_n(r) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q).
